contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |province=QC |type=QC |route=224 |maint=[[Transports Québec]] |map=Route 224-QC.png |established= |decommissioned= |alternate_name= |length_km=50.5 |length_round= 1 |length_ref=<ref>Ministère des transports, "Distances routières", page 84, Les Publications du Québec, 2005</ref> |direction_a=West |direction_b=East |terminus_b={{jct|state=QC|QC|143}} in [[Saint-Bonaventure (village), Quebec|Saint-Bonaventure]] |terminus_a={{jct|state=QC|QC|116|QC|137}} in [[Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec|Saint-Hyacinthe]] |previous_type=QC |previous_route=223 |next_type=QC |next_route=225 |junction= {{jct|state=QC|A|20|QC|116|QC|137}} in Saint-Hyacinthe <br> {{jct|state=QC|QC|239}} in Saint-Marcel-De-Richelieu <br> {{jct|state=QC|QC|239}} in Saint-Guillaume <br> {{jct|state=QC|QC|122}} east of Saint-Guillaume |}}'''Route 224''' is a [[provincial highway]] located in the [[Montérégie]] region of [[Quebec]]. The 48-kilometer road runs from the junction of [[Quebec Route 137|Route 137]] south of Saint-Hyacinthe and runs northeastward pass [[Quebec Route 116|Route 116]] and [[Quebec Autoroute 20|Autoroute 20]] towards its terminus in [[Saint-Bonaventure (village), Quebec|Saint-Bonaventure]] at the junction of [[Quebec Route 143|Route 143]]. It is also concurrent with [[Quebec Route 239|Route 239]] in [[Saint-Marcel-de-Richelieu, Quebec|Saint-Marcel-de-Richelieu]]. ==Municipalities along Route 224== * [[Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec|Saint-Hyacinthe]] * [[Saint-Simon, Quebec|Saint-Simon]] * [[Saint-Hugues, Quebec|Saint Hugues]] * [[Saint-Marcel-de-Richelieu, Quebec|Saint-Marcel-de-Richelieu]] * [[Saint-Guillaume, Quebec|Saint-Guillaume]] * [[Saint-Bonaventure (village), Quebec|Saint Bonaventure]] ==See also== * [[List of Quebec provincial highways]] ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == * [http://www.inforoutiere.qc.ca/fr/carte_routiere/index.asp Official Road Map Network of Transports Quebec] {{fr icon}} * [http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&hl=en&geocode=&saddr=45.61776,-72.923641&daddr=saint-bonaventure,+qc&mra=dme&mrcr=0&mrsp=0&sz=13&dirflg=h&sll=45.631326,-72.899094&sspn=0.054017,0.150375&ie=UTF8&ll=45.789552,-72.730865&spn=0.430916,1.203003&z=10 Route 224] on Google Maps {{Secondary Highways in Quebec (200-series)}} [[Category:Quebec Routes|224]] [[Category:Transport in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec]] {{Quebec-road-stub}}
